Package Challenge

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BFSVertex
    A BFS Vertex contains the x coordinate, the y coordinate, and distance from the source node.
    Cell
    This is a cell class representing an abstract cell in the game.
    Controller
    This class is designed to be used to allows the player to be controlled by the user.
    Door
    This class represents a door.
    DumbEnemy
    A dumb enemy is an enemy whose movement is determined by the players location.
    Enemy
    Enemies are movable hazards designed to end the level upon contact with the player.
    Entity
    An entity is an object unrelated to the environment to the game.
    Equipment
    An equipment is a items that is permanently in a players inventory, allowing the player to traverse through hazards like fire.
    Fire
    Fire is an obstacle in game that, if passed without fire boots will cause player death.
    FireBoots
    Fire boots allow the traversal of fire so long as they are in the players inventory.
    Flippers
    Flippers allow the traversal of water so long as they are in the players inventory.
    Game
    Game is used to render Chips Challenge.
    Goal
    This class represents a goal cell in the game, the objective is for the player to reach it, doing so will complete that level.
    Ground
    This class represents a simple ground cell, it is always passable by the player
    Item
    An item is used to help a player navigate throughout the level.
    Key
    This class represents a Key used to unlock a door in the game, it can be collected by the player and is consumed on use.
    KeyDoor
    This class represents a Door in the game and can be unlocked by a player carrying the correct Key, when it is replaced by a Ground cell
    Level
    This class acts as a kind of super-ish class for the game, holding all information about the grids and allowing the "game" to run.
    LineEnemy
    The Line Enemy is an enemy that will only ever travel in one of two directions, its initial direction or its cardinal opposite, these will change dynamically whenever it comes across an impassable cell.
    Lumberjack
    This class is used entirely for testing, although we may also submit it
    Main  
    MiniMap  
    Obstacle
    This is an abstract class designed to represent Obstacle Cells in the game that may start out impassable but at some point may become passable by the player through the collection of Items and Equipment.
    Ping
    Class used to Ping a web server and return a Message Of The Day to be displayed at all times during the game play
    Player
    This class represents the Player object which will be controlled by the User, it is able to collect move around the game ane interact with both Items and Cells within the level.
    Position
    Position is a class used to represent a kind of Tuple which will hold position values for movable Entitys during the game
    Save
    This class is used to save the game state each tick to ensure Player progress is never lost.
    SmartEnemy  
    SpriteConverter
    SpriteConverter is an abstract class used to edit sprites before they are rendered into the game, resizing and rotating etc
    Teleporter
    This class represents a Teleporter Cell, and by extension its pair whenever a Player walks into one they will appear out of the other.
    Token
    This class represents a Token Item, it can be collected by the player and will be consumed upon use opening a TokenDoor
    TokenDoor
    This class represents a Token Door which requires a set number of Tokens to unlock at which point it will be replaced by a Ground Cell.
    User  
    Wall
    This class represents a Wall Object in the game, it is never passable by either the Player or Enemies.
    WallEnemy
    A wall enemy is an enemy whose movement is determined by the walls in the map, it should always stick to a wall and have it's movement determined by the walls around it.
    Water
    Water is an obstacle in game that, if passed without flippers will cause player death.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Key.Colour
    This is used for the colour of the Key
